plot: 17-year-old Damien never realized that the only man he's ever looked up to might not be the best example of what it means to be a man. Explore a young man's coming of age in a harsh, sometimes cruel world.
title: Be the Man
plot_es: 17-year-old Damien never realized that the only man he's ever looked up to might not be the best example of what it means to be a man. Explore a young man's coming of age in a harsh, sometimes cruel world.
